p: Once the immobilization was completed and the activity of the nanobiocatalysts on pNPB verified, we tested their activity and efficiency in the synthesis of methyl esters (FAMEs) from cooking oil wastes. To compensate for possible evaporation of the alcohol in the reaction and during sampling, it was chosen to work with a methanol:oil molar ratio of 4:1, developing the reactions under green conditions: Solvent-free, 25 °C, and without adding molecular sieves or drying agents.
